Interface Shaker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Device

    public interface Shaker
extends Device
    Interface for 2 Dimensional Mirror Shaker
    Author:
    Will Cork and Carl Cork

      • isInitialized

        boolean isInitialized()
        Initialization status
        Returns:
        true if device is initialized

      • init

             float vmax)
        Initialize device
        Parameters:
        id - Identity of device
        vmax - Max voltage output of device.
        Returns:
        true on success

        Uninitialize a given device

      • enableAmplifier

        boolean enableAmplifier(boolean enable)
        Enable or disable attached amplifier
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • sendDataStream

        boolean sendDataStream(float[] x,
                       float[] y,
                       float[] dout,
                       int sps,
                       boolean loop)
                throws FormatException
        Send 2-D stream to device. The lengths of each array should be the same
        Parameters:
        x - array of floating point numbers for the X axis
        y - array of floating point numbers for the Y axis
        dout - array of points that determine if the digital trigger should be on or off
        sps - samples / second (ex. 1kHz = 1000)
        loop - true when the data stream is intended to loop back to beginning
        Returns:
        true on success
        Throws:
        FormatException - when x,y,dout have incorrect lengths.

      • sendDataStream

        boolean sendDataStream(float[] x,
                       float[] y,
                       int sps,
                       boolean loop)
                throws FormatException
        Send 2-D stream to device. The lengths of each array should be the same
        Parameters:
        x - array of floating point numbers for the X axis
        y - array of floating point numbers for the Y axis
        sps - samples / second (ex. 1kHz = 1000)
        loop - true when the data stream is intended to loop back to beginning
        Returns:
        true on success
        Throws:
        FormatException - when x,y have incorrect lengths.

      • startDataStream

        boolean startDataStream()
        Execute the data stream in the device buffer.
        Returns:
        true when stream is executing

      • stopDataStream

        boolean stopDataStream()
        Stop processing the data stream in device buffer.
        Returns:
        true when stream has stopped

      • clearDataStream

        boolean clearDataStream()
        Purge data in device buffer
        Returns:
        true when data stream is clear

      • home

        boolean home()
        Moves shaker to center position.
        Returns:
        true when operation has completed.

      • goToXY

               float y)
        throws FormatException

        y - position of y
        Returns:

        Throws:
